text: Jya lokanni imana rakhale ani satkarma kele, asanvara gunha nahi jara purvi kahi khalle asela, vastutah nantara te parahejagara (duskarmapasuna dura rahanare) banale, ani imanadharaka jhale va satkarma karu lagale, parahejagarivara kayama rahile ani imanavara atala rahile, maga allahaci avajna karanyapasuna dura rahile ani neki (cya marga) vara calata rahile ani allaha asa neka kama karanaryansi prema rakhato
